job_history.work_description: The program targets disadvantaged middle school students who have been identified by their teachers and principals as bright and motivated. They are given academic, arts, and technology training on a full scholarship basis during a six-week summer session. They are mentored monthly over the course of the year.

projects.description: Coordinated project with East Bay Community Fund, Rebuilding Together Oakland, Temple Sinai, Pulte Construction, and Head-Royce School for the 2006-2008 renovation project of EOBA/Smart Moves community center.
Supervised production of promotional video, fund raising, worked with Destiny faculty as part of the Head-Royce Art and Technology Institute Summer.

Involved in fundraising and installation of water and electrical systems at the Amai A Chifundo Orphanage in Blantyre, Malawi. Also provided funds and equipment for youth soccer organizations nationally in Malawi.
House captain, volunteer coordinator, project organizer, fundraiser for Rebuilding Together Oakland (Formerly Christmas in April).
Organized panel of East Bay Arts organizations to talk about youth access in the arts for Arts Equity-East Bay Youth Access to the Arts.
Video productions working with high school students for community non-profits. The films are used as an informational tool, and a marketing/funding aid.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing projects, including coordinating with multiple organizations and supervising production of promotional videos, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Community Development
skills.explanation: Has been involved in various community development projects, including fundraising, installation of water and electrical systems, and organizing events, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Fundraising
skills.explanation: Has experience in fundraising for various projects and organizations, including the Amai A Chifundo Orphanage and Rebuilding Together Oakland, indicating solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Video Production
skills.explanation: Has experience in video production, including working with high school students and creating informational and marketing materials, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Event Planning
skills.explanation: Has experience in organizing events, including panels and fundraisers, but the scope and frequency of these events are not well-defined, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Volunteer Coordination
skills.explanation: Has experience in coordinating volunteers for Rebuilding Together Oakland, but the extent of this experience is not well-defined, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held various leadership roles, including Executive Director, Chairman, and Director, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has experience as an instructor at Head-Royce School, indicating solid working proficiency in teaching.
